snippet: Stoke City forward Peter Crouch said Premier League players would need to adapt to a clampdown by referees on pushing and holding in the penalty area, expressing concern that the new guidelines might lead to a farcical number of penalty awards....

headline.main: Premier League Clampdown Could Lead to Farcical Number of Penalties-Crouch
headline.print_headline: Premier League Clampdown Could Lead to Farcical Number of Penalties-Crouch

lead_paragraph: Stoke City forward Peter Crouch said Premier League players would need to adapt to a clampdown by referees on pushing and holding in the penalty area, expressing concern that the new guidelines might lead to a farcical number of penalty awards.

snippet: Two traditional powers won on Saturday to give themselves a bit of hope as they chase upstart Leicester City for the Premier League title....

headline.main: Arsenal Clings to Premier League Hopes
headline.print_headline: Barcelona’s Streak Ends in Clásico Loss to Madrid

abstract: Soccer Roundup; Real Madrid defeats Barcelona, 2-1; other soccer scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Two traditional powers won on Saturday to give themselves a bit of hope as they chase upstart Leicester City for the Premier League title.

snippet: Egypt midfielder Mohamed Elneny will need to adapt to the challenges of playing in the Premier League if he is to succeed at the Emirates Stadium, Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger said....

headline.main: Elneny Needs to Adapt to Physical Nature of Premier League-Wenger
headline.print_headline: Elneny Needs to Adapt to Physical Nature of Premier League-Wenger

lead_paragraph: Egypt midfielder Mohamed Elneny will need to adapt to the challenges of playing in the Premier League if he is to succeed at the Emirates Stadium, Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger said.

snippet: The English Football League, which has 72 members, has ruled out Premier League B teams and 'non-English' clubs being part of league football as part of a proposed revamp of the English game....

headline.main: Premier League 'B' Teams, Non-English Clubs Ruled Out of Shake-Up
headline.print_headline: Premier League 'B' Teams, Non-English Clubs Ruled Out of Shake-Up

lead_paragraph: The English Football League, which has 72 members, has ruled out Premier League B teams and 'non-English' clubs being part of league football as part of a proposed revamp of the English game.

snippet: The Diamond League will have two end-of-season finals with a prize pool of $3.2 million following changes to the structure of the competition announced by the International Association of Athletics' Federations (IAAF) on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: The Diamond League will have two end-of-season finals with a prize pool of $3.2 million following changes to the structure of the competition announced by the International Association of Athletics' Federations (IAAF) on Wednesday.

snippet: The English Premier League has sold its television rights in China to streaming service PPTV for $700 million (565 million pounds), a source familiar with the matter said, several times the size of past deals as it cashes in on a growing enthusias...

headline.main: English Premier League Sells China TV Rights for $700 Million-Source
headline.print_headline: English Premier League Sells China TV Rights for $700 Million-Source

lead_paragraph: The English Premier League has sold its television rights in China to streaming service PPTV for $700 million (565 million pounds), a source familiar with the matter said, several times the size of past deals as it cashes in on a growing enthusiasm for football.

snippet: The English Premier League has sold its television rights in China to streaming service PPTV for around $700 million, a source familiar with the matter said, several times the size of past deals as it cashes in on a growing enthusiasm for soccer....

headline.main: English Premier League Sells China TV Rights for Around $700 Million-Source
headline.print_headline: English Premier League Sells China TV Rights for Around $700 Million-Source

lead_paragraph: The English Premier League has sold its television rights in China to streaming service PPTV for around $700 million, a source familiar with the matter said, several times the size of past deals as it cashes in on a growing enthusiasm for soccer.

snippet: The Premier League's only remaining unbeaten records are on the line on Sunday when Tottenham Hotspur will hope to follow Celtic and inflict another dent in Manchester City's superb start to the campaign....

headline.main: Unbeaten Records at Stake as Top Two Clash in Premier League
headline.print_headline: Unbeaten Records at Stake as Top Two Clash in Premier League

lead_paragraph: The Premier League's only remaining unbeaten records are on the line on Sunday when Tottenham Hotspur will hope to follow Celtic and inflict another dent in Manchester City's superb start to the campaign.

snippet: The bookmaking industry faces its biggest loss in Premier League history with Leicester City just one win away from clinching a shock first title, major bookmaker William Hill said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Leicester's Fairy Tale Saddles Bookmakers With Biggest Loss in Premier League History
headline.print_headline: Leicester's Fairy Tale Saddles Bookmakers With Biggest Loss in Premier League History

lead_paragraph: The bookmaking industry faces its biggest loss in Premier League history with Leicester City just one win away from clinching a shock first title, major bookmaker William Hill said on Tuesday.

snippet: Manchester United's stumbles in the Premier League continued Sunday with a 1-1 home draw against struggling Stoke, which left Old Trafford without losing for the first time in 36 years....

headline.main: Man United Held 1-1 by Last-Place Stoke in Premier League
headline.print_headline: Man United Held 1-1 by Last-Place Stoke in Premier League

lead_paragraph: Manchester United's stumbles in the Premier League continued Sunday with a 1-1 home draw against struggling Stoke, which left Old Trafford without losing for the first time in 36 years.
